readable.title: 2172526745_649f420569
readable.content: A boy wearing a red shirt dumps water out of a yellow bucket onto a girl 's head . A little boy and a little girl play together in the water . A young boy at a water park pouring a bucket water on a young girl in a swimsuit . The boy is pouring a bucket of water over a girl 's head . Two young children play with water in a fountain .
